attributes.action: Raise the qualifying amount of income for free loft insulation and cavity wall insulation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to suggest to the government that they should raise the amount of qualifying income for free loft insulation and cavity wall insulation. If more people were able to do this without a large capital outlay,then it would make a huge impact on the environment and our carbon footprint.
